title: Climate change is rapidly accelerating in California, state report says
dc:creator: Hayley Smith
description: The state report paints a stark picture of California's escalating climate crisis and documents wide-ranging effects on weather, water and residents.
content:encoded: The state report paints a stark picture of California's escalating climate crisis and documents wide-ranging effects on weather, water and residents.

media:content.media:description: HEMET, CAL;IF. - SEP. 9, 2022. A firefighter walks through the burn zone of the. Fairview fire near Hemet on Friday, Sep. 9, 2022. Light rain and higher humidity gave firefighters a chance to get more containment around the fire, which has burned about 28,000 aces in and around the San Bernardino National Forest. (Luis Sinco / Los Angeles Times)
